about_the_game:
This DLC allows you to disable censorship.

ATTENTION!!!
TO DISABLE THE CENSORSHIP, AFTER INSTALLING THE DLC, GO TO THE CLOAKROOM AND CLICK ON THE CORRESPONDING BUTTON IN THE RIGHT CORNER!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game has cartoon nudity, scenes with the possibility of undressing.
The game has an element of cruelty in the form of an explosion of atomic missiles on the surface of the planet.

detailed_description:
This DLC allows you to disable censorship.

ATTENTION!!!
TO DISABLE THE CENSORSHIP, AFTER INSTALLING THE DLC, GO TO THE CLOAKROOM AND CLICK ON THE CORRESPONDING BUTTON IN THE RIGHT CORNER!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux OS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0 compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0 compatible

name: Anime And Your Life - Hentai (Uncensored)

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0 compatible
